description:
USN-3765-1 fixed a vulnerability in curl. This update provides
the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 It was discovered that curl incorrectly handled certain inputs.
 An attacker could possibly use this to execute arbitrary code.

curl.description: HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP client and client libraries

title: curl vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
curl could be made to run arbitrary code if it received a specially
crafted input.
